35 // Structure BallAndSocketJointInfo
40 struct BallAndSocketJointInfo : public JointInfo {
41 
42  public :
43 
44  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
45 
47  Vector3 anchorPointWorldSpace;
48 
50 
56  BallAndSocketJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
57  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace)
58  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::BALLSOCKETJOINT),
59  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace) {}
60 };

143 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
144 inline size_t BallAndSocketJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
145  return sizeof(BallAndSocketJoint);
146 }
147 
148 // Return a string representation
149 inline std::string BallAndSocketJoint::to_string() const {
150  return "BallAndSocketJoint{ localAnchorPointBody1=" + mLocalAnchorPointBody1.to_string() +
151  ", localAnchorPointBody2=" + mLocalAnchorPointBody2.to_string() + "}";
152 }
